original_text: And when both are blown, all the congregation shall gather themselves to you at the entrance of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 나팔 두 개를 불 때에는 온 회중이 회막 문 앞에 모여서 네게로 나아올 것이요

sentences.original_text: all the congregation shall gather themselves to you
sentences.korean_translation: 온 회중이 네게로 모여야 할 것이니

sentences.original_text: at the entrance of the tent of meeting
